definitions.definition: A tree or plant that has been miniaturized by planting it in a small pot , restricting its roots , and by careful pruning .
The art of planting and growing trees or plants in such a manner.

main_definition: ( countable ) A tree or plant that has been miniaturized by planting it in a small pot , restricting its roots , and by careful pruning .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The art of planting and growing trees or plants in such a manner.
